comments.content: Great work on the hero section! The design looks modern and engaging.
Thanks! I've incorporated the feedback from last week's meeting.
Desktop and mobile navigation are complete. Moving on to accessibility testing.
I can help with accessibility testing. Let me know when you're ready.
RDS instance is configured and ready. Starting migration script tests today.
Make sure to test rollback procedures as well.

usageGuidelines.title: Primary Logo Usage
usageGuidelines.description: Guidelines for proper usage of the primary logo
dosList: Maintain minimum clear space equal to the height of the 'R' letter
Use provided vector files for all applications
dontsList: Don't rotate or distort the logo

usageGuidelines.title: White Logo Usage
usageGuidelines.description: Guidelines for the white logo variant

usageGuidelines.title: Color Palette Guidelines
dosList: Use primary blue as the main brand color
Use secondary colors for accents only
dontsList: Don't use colors at reduced opacity without approval
Don't combine too many colors in one design
Don't use colors that aren't in the palette

colorPalettes.name: Primary Brand Colors
colorPalettes.description: Main brand color palette for all applications

ecommerceReviews.text: Super fast delivery, package was in perfect condition!
Delivery was on time, friendly driver.
Amazing service! Gift wrapping was beautifully done.
Delivery was okay but arrived a bit later than expected.
Excellent! Very professional and careful with the package.
Good tracking updates throughout the delivery.
Kevin always delivers with a smile. Outstanding!
Package arrived with minor damage to the outer box.

emailTemplates.name: Order Confirmation
emailTemplates.subject: Your order #{{orderNumber}} has been confirmed
emailTemplates.body:
Thank you for your order!

Hi {{customerName}},

We've received your order #{{orderNumber}} for {{amount}}.

We'll notify you once your order has been dispatched.

Best regards,
The Phoxta Team

emailTemplates.name: Shipping Notification
emailTemplates.subject: Your order #{{orderNumber}} has been shipped!
emailTemplates.body:
Your order is on its way!

Hi {{customerName}},

Great news your order #{{orderNumber}} has been dispatched and is on its way to you.

Estimated delivery: {{deliveryDate}}

Kind regards,
The Phoxta Team

emailTemplates.name: Welcome Email
emailTemplates.subject: Welcome to Phoxta, {{customerName}}!
emailTemplates.body:
Welcome aboard!

Hi {{customerName}},

Thank you for joining Phoxta. We're excited to have you!

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

Cheers,
The Phoxta Team

emailTemplates.name: Support Ticket Reply
emailTemplates.subject: Re: Support Ticket #{{ticketNumber}}
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{customerName}},

Thank you for reaching out. We've reviewed your support request #{{ticketNumber}}.

{{responseBody}}

If you need further assistance, please reply to this email.

Best,
Phoxta Support

emailTemplates.name: Monthly Newsletter
emailTemplates.subject: Phoxta Monthly Update  {{month}}
emailTemplates.body:
Monthly Update

Hi {{customerName}},

Here's what's new at Phoxta this month:

  • {{highlight1}}
  • {{highlight2}}
  • {{highlight3}}

Stay tuned for more updates!

The Phoxta Team

emailTemplates.name: Invoice Reminder
emailTemplates.subject: Invoice #{{invoiceNumber}}  Payment Due
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{customerName}},

This is a friendly reminder that invoice #{{invoiceNumber}} for {{amount}} is due on {{dueDate}}.

Please ensure payment is made by the due date.

Thank you,
Phoxta Finance

emails.subject: Partnership Proposal  2026 Integration
emails.body:
Hi there,

Following up on our discussion at the conference last week. We'd love to explore a deeper integration between our platforms.

I've drafted a brief proposal outlining the key areas we think could benefit both teams.

Would next Wednesday at 2pm work for a call?

Regards,
David
emails.snippet: Hi there, Following up on our discussion at the conference last week. We'd love to explore a deeper integration between our platforms.
